1909 T206 Bresnahan (batting) (white mark top right into background)-$110.00
1909 T206 Clarke (batting) crease-$110.00
1909 T206 Eddie Collins (diagonal paper loss upper right corner and a little wrinkle top center down to top of head)-$250.00
1909 T206 Huggins (specks of paper loss on front and black on left side next to ear)-$75.00
1910 T206 Willis (Batting)-THIS IS A DOG. Multiple creases including upper left corner as well as creases along the top of the card and two creases going diagonally upward from the lower left yellow background through Willis' face. Also, if you hold the card up to a light, there is a break in the paper below his eye on the right side of the card. Again, THIS IS A DOG-$75.00

S/h is $4.50 (tracking without signature). If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family. [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url]
